items.question: What is text to speech?
items.answer: Text to speech (TTS) is a technology that converts written text into spoken audio. TTS Easy uses advanced AI voices from Google Cloud to produce natural-sounding speech in multiple languages and accents.

items.question: Is TTS Easy free to use?
items.answer: Yes, TTS Easy is completely free. You can convert text to speech and download MP3 files without creating an account or paying anything.

items.question: What languages and accents are supported?
items.answer: TTS Easy supports 6 languages with 11 accent variants: English (US, UK, Australia), Spanish (Mexico, Spain, Argentina), Portuguese (Brazil, Portugal), French (France), German (Germany), and Italian (Italy).

items.question: Can I download the audio as MP3?
items.answer: Yes, every generated audio can be downloaded as an MP3 file with a single click. The file is ready for use in videos, presentations, or any other project.

items.question: Is my text stored or shared?
items.answer: No. Your text is processed in-memory only and is immediately discarded after the audio is generated. We never store, log, or share your text content.

items.question: How do I change the voice accent?
items.answer: TTS Easy automatically detects the language and accent of your text. You can also switch to Manual mode and select any of the 11 available accents from the dropdown menu.

items.question: Can I use the audio for YouTube videos?
items.answer: Yes, you can use the generated audio for YouTube videos, podcasts, presentations, e-learning content, and any other personal or commercial project.

about.title: About
about.p1: TTS Easy is a lightweight text-to-speech web app designed for fast language detection, accent selection, and quick MP3 generation.
about.p2: The project prioritizes global usability, transparent privacy defaults, and practical monetization through moderate ad placements.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: We do not store the text you paste for speech generation. Your text is processed in-memory and discarded after audio is produced.
privacy.p2: We use analytics and advertising tools (Google Analytics and Google AdSense) to measure traffic and display ads. These tools may use cookies according to their own policies.
privacy.p3: Abuse prevention data (rate-limit counters and CAPTCHA verification status) is stored only as aggregated security metadata and never contains your raw text.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.p1: This service is provided on an as-is basis for converting text to speech. You agree not to use it for abusive, unlawful, or automated scraping behaviors.
terms.p2: We may enforce rate limits, CAPTCHA challenges, or temporary blocks to protect service availability and budget.
terms.p3: By using this website, you acknowledge that synthesized audio quality depends on selected locale, reader profile, and cloud provider capabilities.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.p1: This website uses cookies and similar technologies for three purposes: analytics (GA4), ad delivery (AdSense), and fraud prevention.
cookies.p2: You can control cookies from your browser settings. Blocking cookies may impact ad rendering and some personalization features.
